entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with wet flurries in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023
